page.title: 04AIRFIELD
page.content: The airfield was originally built in World War 2 as an American Air base. Today it is used by light aeroplanes and a Glider Club,it is open to the public at weekends. On the airfield is a windsock wich is used by the pilots to tell them the direction the wind is blowing.There are also hangers used to store aircraft and gliders when they are not being used. People enjoy flying gliders here because it is peaceful and all they can hear is the rushing wind.When they look down they can see the fields full off crops and poeple or animals looking like tiny ants.
